forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 21, with temperatures rising to around 23 overnight. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 36. South southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 11pm and 2am, then rain and snow between 2am and 3am, then rain and snow between 3am and 5am, then rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 29, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. South southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before noon. Cloudy, with a high near 34. West wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 25. South wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers between 10am and 4pm, then a chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 38. South wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7pm, then a chance of snow showers between 7pm and 8pm, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 20, with temperatures rising to around 26 overnight. West wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 23. Northwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 16, 2025.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Trails were unable to be groomed today, January 16, 2025 due to limited snowfall.  You are always welcome to come out and blaze your own trail.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 18th and 19th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Perfect conditions for skating and classic on Bucks Run. Golf course is not groomed and no info on whether it will be before the weekend.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: They've finally got enough accumulation to make the golf course skiable. Used waxless rock skis and had a very nice time. Skied some in the woods, flats are doable but wouldn't try any hills, not enough snow yet.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Best conditions of the year on the upper Red and Blue loops ! Thank you Mother Nature , Nubs Nob , and John Baker . It was like skiing on butter .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be packed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM
nubsNob.comments: It is an ideal ski day at Nub's Nob. There is a bit of fluff sitting on top of the groom. The temperature is just below freezing and conditions are exceptional. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM today with an hour break beginning at 4:30 to prepare for the night session. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
